title: Moving towards food security in South Asian region: Assessing the role of agricultural trade openness, production and employment
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Lihong Fan, Nazhat Nury Aspy, Dilruba Yesmin Smrity, Md. Farid Dewan, Md. Golam Kibria, Mohammad Haseeb, Mustafa Kamal, Md. Saidur Rahman
